import { memo, useContext } from 'react' import { CommonDataForAllViewService } from '../ViewInformationServicePending' function ViewInformationAccommodation({ languageSelected }) { const service = useContext(CommonDataForAllViewService) return ( <>
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setPropertyName(e.target.value)} value={propertyName} />
setNumberOfFloors(e.target.value)} onFocus={(e) => handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} type='number' min={0} />
